name: Super Jagua
description: Super Jagua is a classic 2D retro-style single-player platformer inspired by the greatest platformers of the 80s. Run, jump, swim, discover lots of secrets, fight brutal bosses and more in this classic NES inspired adventure.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 or better, Vista, Win7, 8, 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.0GHz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 12 MB available space Sound Card: Soundblaster or equivalent

reviews.review_text: A fun game that feels and sounds just like a nes or sega master system game. No save feature, and 30 something levels, with a few secrets hidden about. Somewhat challenging, though if you can beat mario 3 you can probably finish this game too.  It controls mostly like mario 3, and the sound is mostly like a sega master system game.  Recommended for old school platformer fans.
very nice game for a nice price !
